basic.Target Organism: [Ref.19734717] Gram-negative bacteria:Acidovorax konjaci(MEC=2.5 nM), Pseudomonas syringae pv. tomato DC3000 (MEC=5 nM), Pectobacterium carotovorum subsp. atrosepticum (MEC=5 nM), Xanthomonas albilineans (MEC=0.3 nM), Xanthomonas campestris pv. vesicatoria 833 (MEC=0.3 nM), Xanthomonas campestris pv. vesicatoria 833 pilA (MEC=0.3 nM), Xanthomonas oryzae pv. oryzae 599 (MEC=1.3 nM), Xanthomonas oryzae pv. oryzae 710 (MEC=1.3 nM), Xanthomonas oryzae pv. oryzae 090 (MEC=1.3 nM);Gram-positive bacterium:Clavibacter michiganensis subsp. michiganensis (MEC=0.3 nM)
